title: Drawing, 1939-85-31, September 1878
medium:
Graphite with watercolor wash on white wove paper
Verso: Graphite, pen and ink
inscribed:
Recto: in graphite upper left margin: warm gray sand  dune/ [illeg.] of water/ brown grass. 
At center: warm clouds [? ] little darker than sky /  Forms or soft luminous green to gray/ soft gray/edge of sand darker than sky/ warm gray sand/edge of water light blue/water darker blue than sky/warm green brown; Figure with net in water/ reddish brown vest reddish brown shoes./ Sea Girt. Sept.9th 1878.
Across bottom of sheet: warm purplish grey  trunk orange reflections

Verso: Inscribed in graphite, lower middle, towards left: Sea Girt Cedars./ Sept 10th 1878.  Middle bottom: Bay / Rich yellow green.
description:
Recto: Top row, view from dunes toward the sea and far shore. Color notations written with pencil along left edge. Second row: A dwelling surrounded by trees shown in the middle distance. Third row: sky over the dunes and sea. Masts of ships shown in background. Inscribed with color notations. First row, left: a man with a net, standing in water. Horizontal lines are drawn beneath sketches. Place and date left. Bottom: a tree in the dunes, with color notations written beneath. 
Verso: At top, an old cedar growing in front of bushes and trees. At bottom of sheet, a bush, with place, name and date. At right, dunes with sea shown in left background.
